statements: UPDATE conflict_resolution_strategies SET successful_attempts = 50, total_attempts = 100 WHERE strategy_id = 1;

UPDATE conflict_resolution_strategies SET successful_attempts = total_attempts - 10, total_attempts = total_attempts + 20 WHERE strategy_name = 'Collaborative Problem-Solving';
UPDATE conflict_resolution_strategies SET success_rate = 0.75 WHERE strategy_name = 'Collaboration'
